abstract: United States will sponsor United Nations Human Rights Council resolution that supports plans by Sri Lankan government for reconciliation and calls for investigation into possible war crimes by Sri Lankan government during final stages of its civil war; announcement signals shift in Sri Lanka's position on war crimes investigation, which it has long resisted despite pressure from US.
lead_paragraph: The announcement signals a reversal of Washington’s longstanding insistence on an international inquiry into possible war crimes during the final stages of the island’s civil war.

headline.main: U.S. to Support Sri Lanka Plan to Investigate War Crimes
